[{"type":"lens","title":"Frozen Tiers Blob Storage Metrics","embeddableConfig":{"enhancements":{"dynamicActions":{"events":[]}},"syncColors":false,"syncCursor":true,"syncTooltips":false,"searchSessionId":"1bd24d71-e681-46be-ae7e-ca487e411b36","filters":[],"query":{"esql":"FROM .ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*
| WHERE event.dataset == "elasticsearch.index" 
  AND @timestamp >= NOW() - 15 minutes
  AND elasticsearch.index.tier_preference == "data_frozen"
| STATS 
    latest_dataset_bytes = MAX(elasticsearch.index.total.store.total_data_set_size_in_bytes),
    latest_store_bytes = MAX(elasticsearch.index.total.store.size_in_bytes),
    latest_docs = MAX(elasticsearch.index.total.docs.count)
  BY index_name = elasticsearch.index.name
| STATS 
    frozen_indices = COUNT(*),
    total_blob_bytes = SUM(latest_dataset_bytes),
    total_cache_bytes = SUM(latest_store_bytes),
    total_docs = SUM(latest_docs)
| EVAL 
    blob_storage_tb = ROUND(total_blob_bytes / 1099511627776.0, 2),
    blob_storage_gb = ROUND(total_blob_bytes / 1073741824.0, 2),
    local_cache_gb = ROUND(total_cache_bytes / 1073741824.0, 2),
    docs_billions = ROUND(total_docs / 1000000000.0, 2)
| DROP total_blob_bytes, total_cache_bytes, total_docs
"},"attributes":{"title":"frozen_indices & blob_storage_tb & blob_storage_gb & local_cache_gb & docs_billions of (empty)","references":[],"state":{"datasourceStates":{"textBased":{"layers":{"9e95c379-1df9-4c21-a998-dd9c56283d7d":{"index":"e9103421839cb1c15d6ed79047789428caeda2cded1a8b7f436e0ab90d00dc85","query":{"esql":"FROM .ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*

| WHERE event.dataset == "elasticsearch.node.stats"
  AND @timestamp >= NOW() - 15 minutes
| STATS 
    latest_disk_total = MAX(elasticsearch.node.stats.fs.summary.total.bytes),
    latest_disk_available = MAX(elasticsearch.node.stats.fs.summary.available.bytes),
    latest_indices_bytes = MAX(elasticsearch.node.stats.indices.store.size.bytes),
    latest_docs = MAX(elasticsearch.node.stats.indices.docs.count)
  BY node_name = elasticsearch.node.name, roles = elasticsearch.node.roles
| EVAL 
    disk_total_gb = ROUND(latest_disk_total / 1073741824.0, 2),
    disk_available_gb = ROUND(latest_disk_available / 1073741824.0, 2),
    disk_used_gb = ROUND((latest_disk_total - latest_disk_available) / 1073741824.0, 2),
    indices_gb = ROUND(latest_indices_bytes / 1073741824.0, 2),
    utilization_pct = ROUND(((latest_disk_total - latest_disk_available) / latest_disk_total) * 100, 1)
| DROP latest_disk_total, latest_disk_available, latest_indices_bytes
| SORT indices_gb DESC

| WHERE event.dataset == "elasticsearch.index" 
  AND @timestamp >= NOW() - 1 hour
| STATS 
    earliest_indexed = MIN(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total),
    latest_indexed = MAX(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total)
  BY index_name = elasticsearch.index.name
| EVAL docs_indexed = latest_indexed - earliest_indexed
| EVAL docs_per_second = docs_indexed / 3600
| WHERE docs_per_second > 0
| SORT docs_per_second DESC
| EVAL 
    Index = index_name,
    Docs_per_sec = ROUND(docs_per_second, 2),
    Docs_Last_Hour = docs_indexed
| KEEP Index, Docs_per_sec, Docs_Last_Hour
| LIMIT 15

| WHERE event.dataset == "elasticsearch.index" 
  AND @timestamp >= NOW() - 24 hours
| STATS 
    earliest_indexed = MIN(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total),
    latest_indexed = MAX(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total)
  BY index_name = elasticsearch.index.name
| EVAL docs_indexed = latest_indexed - earliest_indexed
| WHERE docs_indexed > 0
| EVAL index_pattern = CASE(
    index_name LIKE ".ds-.monitoring-*", "Monitoring",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-logs-*", "Logs",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-metrics-*", "Metrics",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-traces-*", "Traces",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-elastic-cloud-*", "Cloud",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-metricbeat-*", "Metricbeat",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-filebeat-*", "Filebeat",
    "Other"
  )
| STATS 
    total_docs = SUM(docs_indexed),
    index_count = COUNT(*)
  BY Pattern = index_pattern
| EVAL 
    Docs_per_sec = ROUND(total_docs / 86400, 2),
    Total_Docs_24h = total_docs,
    Indices = index_count
| SORT Docs_per_sec DESC
| KEEP Pattern, Docs_per_sec, Total_Docs_24h, Indices
"},"attributes":{"title":"Docs_per_sec & Total_Docs_24h & Indices of Pattern","references":[],"state":{"datasourceStates":{"textBased":{"layers":{"84a6f94e-7714-4827-8719-6aa38a4bda01":{"index":"e9103421839cb1c15d6ed79047789428caeda2cded1a8b7f436e0ab90d00dc85","query":{"esql":"FROM .ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*
| WHERE event.dataset == "elasticsearch.index" 
  AND @timestamp >= NOW() - 24 hours
| STATS 
    earliest_indexed = MIN(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total),
    latest_indexed = MAX(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total)
  BY index_name = elasticsearch.index.name
| EVAL docs_indexed = latest_indexed - earliest_indexed
| WHERE docs_indexed > 0
| EVAL index_pattern = CASE(
    index_name LIKE ".ds-.monitoring-*", "Monitoring",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-logs-*", "Logs",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-metrics-*", "Metrics",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-traces-*", "Traces",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-elastic-cloud-*", "Cloud",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-metricbeat-*", "Metricbeat",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-filebeat-*", "Filebeat",
    "Other"
  )
| STATS 
    total_docs = SUM(docs_indexed),
    index_count = COUNT(*)
  BY Pattern = index_pattern
| EVAL 
    Docs_per_sec = ROUND(total_docs / 86400, 2),
    Total_Docs_24h = total_docs,
    Indices = index_count
| SORT Docs_per_sec DESC
| KEEP Pattern, Docs_per_sec, Total_Docs_24h, Indices
"},"columns":[{"columnId":"Pattern","fieldName":"Pattern","label":"Pattern","customLabel":false,"meta":{"type":"string","esType":"keyword"}},{"columnId":"Docs_per_sec","fieldName":"Docs_per_sec","label":"Docs_per_sec","customLabel":false,"meta":{"type":"number","esType":"long"},"inMetricDimension":true},{"columnId":"Total_Docs_24h","fieldName":"Total_Docs_24h","label":"Total_Docs_24h","customLabel":false,"meta":{"type":"number","esType":"long"},"inMetricDimension":true},{"columnId":"Indices","fieldName":"Indices","label":"Indices","customLabel":false,"meta":{"type":"number","esType":"long"},"inMetricDimension":true}],"timeField":"@timestamp"}},"indexPatternRefs":[{"id":"e9103421839cb1c15d6ed79047789428caeda2cded1a8b7f436e0ab90d00dc85","title":".ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*","timeField":"@timestamp"}]}},"filters":[],"query":{"esql":"FROM .ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*
| WHERE event.dataset == "elasticsearch.index" 
  AND @timestamp >= NOW() - 24 hours
| STATS 
    earliest_indexed = MIN(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total),
    latest_indexed = MAX(elasticsearch.index.primaries.indexing.index_total)
  BY index_name = elasticsearch.index.name
| EVAL docs_indexed = latest_indexed - earliest_indexed
| WHERE docs_indexed > 0
| EVAL index_pattern = CASE(
    index_name LIKE ".ds-.monitoring-*", "Monitoring",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-logs-*", "Logs",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-metrics-*", "Metrics",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-traces-*", "Traces",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-elastic-cloud-*", "Cloud",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-metricbeat-*", "Metricbeat",
    index_name LIKE ".ds-filebeat-*", "Filebeat",
    "Other"
  )
| STATS 
    total_docs = SUM(docs_indexed),
    index_count = COUNT(*)
  BY Pattern = index_pattern
| EVAL 
    Docs_per_sec = ROUND(total_docs / 86400, 2),
    Total_Docs_24h = total_docs,
    Indices = index_count
| SORT Docs_per_sec DESC
| KEEP Pattern, Docs_per_sec, Total_Docs_24h, Indices
"},"visualization":{"legend":{"isVisible":true,"position":"right"},"valueLabels":"hide","fittingFunction":"Linear","axisTitlesVisibilitySettings":{"x":true,"yLeft":true,"yRight":true},"tickLabelsVisibilitySettings":{"x":true,"yLeft":true,"yRight":true},"labelsOrientation":{"x":0,"yLeft":0,"yRight":0},"gridlinesVisibilitySettings":{"x":true,"yLeft":true,"yRight":true},"preferredSeriesType":"bar_stacked","layers":[{"layerId":"84a6f94e-7714-4827-8719-6aa38a4bda01","seriesType":"bar_stacked","xAccessor":"Pattern","accessors":["Docs_per_sec","Total_Docs_24h","Indices"],"layerType":"data","colorMapping":{"assignments":[],"specialAssignments":[{"rule":{"type":"other"},"color":{"type":"loop"},"touched":false}],"paletteId":"default","colorMode":{"type":"categorical"}}}]},"adHocDataViews":{"e9103421839cb1c15d6ed79047789428caeda2cded1a8b7f436e0ab90d00dc85":{"id":"e9103421839cb1c15d6ed79047789428caeda2cded1a8b7f436e0ab90d00dc85","title":".ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*","timeFieldName":"@timestamp","sourceFilters":[],"type":"esql","fieldFormats":{},"runtimeFieldMap":{},"allowNoIndex":false,"name":".ds-.monitoring-es-8-mb-*","allowHidden":false}},"needsRefresh":false},"visualizationType":"lnsXY"}},"panelIndex":"95058ac8-0a0e-4393-aede-0fd385368ccb","gridData":{"i":"95058ac8-0a0e-4393-aede-0fd385368ccb","y":35,"x":0,"w":24,"h":15}},{"type":"lens","title":"Blob Storage Trend","embeddableConfig":{"enhancements":{"dynamicActions":{"events":[]}},"syncColors":false,"syncCursor":true,"syncTooltips":false,"searchSessionId":"1bd24d71-e681-46be-ae7e-ca487e411b36","filters":[],"query":{"esql":"FROM storage-metrics-frozen-tier
